creator: Peeksoft: Stock Market & Investing
descriptionHtml:
✓ Track stocks and equity, funds, ETFs, currencies in the stock market, and unlisted equity

✓ Manage your stock portfolios and view performance over time, with metrics such as realized gains, unrealized gains, daily and total changes, and annualized gains

✓ View allocation balance of each stock holding in your overall portfolio with pie charts

✓ Multiple stocks portfolios support - track multiple stock markets, stock portfolios, or watchlists

✓ Convert stock portfolios to one currency using real-time foreign exchange rates - mix stock quotes and holdings from different stock markets and display it using a currency of your choice

✓ Stock market news feed and news for each stock quote. Customize which international markets to retrieve news for.

✓ Real-time stock quotes for US exchanges and some international stock markets

✓ Foreign exchange rates and currency converter

✓ Track the Cryptocurrency market. Supports Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, and alt coins such as Ripple, Bitcoin Cash, Monero, and more.

✓ Extended hours support for pre-market and after-market hours

✓ Stocks widget that displays stock quotes and holdings

✓ Full screen charts. Line, Area, Candlestick, Logarithmic and more. Pinch-zoom, trackball, and panning support.

✓ Detailed info on each stock quote including daily/yearly price ranges, market cap, P/E, EPS, Volume, Average Volume, Beta, Dividend & Yield.

✓ Password lock support - prevent others from seeing your stock quotes even if your phone is unlocked

✓ Synchronize across multiple devices

✓ CSV import and export to Google Drive and Email
descriptionShort: Track Stocks, your Stock Portfolios, and your Investment Performance

appDetails.developerAddress: 641 O Farrell Street, San Francisco, CA
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Historical chart: Add option for value change % (all-time change divided by portfolio value)
- Fix bug when sorting by name on holdings tab
- Bug fixes

title: My Stocks Portfolio & Widget

container.value: 641 O Farrell Street, San Francisco, CA

creator: Peeksoft: Stock Market & Investing
descriptionHtml:
✓ Track stocks and equity, funds, ETFs, currencies in the stock market, and unlisted equity

✓ Manage your stock portfolios and view performance over time, with metrics such as realized gains, unrealized gains, daily and total changes, and annualized gains

✓ View allocation balance of each stock holding in your overall portfolio with pie charts

✓ Multiple stocks portfolios support - track multiple stock markets, stock portfolios, or watchlists

✓ Convert stock portfolios to one currency using real-time foreign exchange rates - mix stock quotes and holdings from different stock markets and display it using a currency of your choice

✓ Stock market news feed and news for each stock quote. Customize which international markets to retrieve news for.

✓ Real-time stock quotes for US exchanges and some international stock markets

✓ Foreign exchange rates and currency converter

✓ Track the Cryptocurrency market. Supports Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, and alt coins such as Ripple, Bitcoin Cash, Monero, and more.

✓ Extended hours support for pre-market and after-market hours

✓ Stocks widget that displays stock quotes and holdings

✓ Full screen charts. Line, Area, Candlestick, Logarithmic and more. Pinch-zoom, trackball, and panning support.

✓ Detailed info on each stock quote including daily/yearly price ranges, market cap, P/E, EPS, Volume, Average Volume, Beta, Dividend & Yield.

✓ Password lock support - prevent others from seeing your stock quotes even if your phone is unlocked

✓ Synchronize across multiple devices

✓ CSV import and export to Google Drive and Email

✓ Track stocks and equity, funds, ETFs, currencies in the stock market, and unlisted equity

✓ Manage your stock portfolios and view performance over time, with metrics such as realized gains, unrealized gains, daily and total changes, and annualized gains

✓ View allocation balance of each stock holding in your overall portfolio with pie charts

✓ Multiple stocks portfolios support - track multiple stock markets, stock portfolios, or watchlists

✓ Convert stock portfolios to one currency using real-time foreign exchange rates - mix stock quotes and holdings from different stock markets and display it using a currency of your choice

✓ Stock market news feed and news for each stock quote. Customize which international markets to retrieve news for.

✓ Real-time stock quotes for US exchanges and some international stock markets

✓ Foreign exchange rates and currency converter

✓ Track the Cryptocurrency market. Supports Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, and alt coins such as Ripple, Bitcoin Cash, Monero, and more.

✓ Extended hours support for pre-market and after-market hours

✓ Stocks widget that displays stock quotes and holdings

✓ Full screen charts. Line, Area, Candlestick, Logarithmic and more. Pinch-zoom, trackball, and panning support.

✓ Detailed info on each stock quote including daily/yearly price ranges, market cap, P/E, EPS, Volume, Average Volume, Beta, Dividend & Yield.

✓ Password lock support - prevent others from seeing your stock quotes even if your phone is unlocked

✓ Synchronize across multiple devices

✓ CSV import and export to Google Drive and Email
descriptionShort: Track Stocks, your Stock Portfolios, and your Investment Performance

appDetails.developerAddress: 641 O Farrell Street, San Francisco, CA
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Biometric (fingerprint / face) login
- Stock splits and reverse split transactions (Add/edit transaction screen, Type dropdown). See help menu, announcements.
- View all positions for a symbol between all portfolios from overview details tab > pie chart, or by searching for the symbol on the add quote page and tapping the price preview
- Aggregated activity of past transactions between all portfolios/quotes (Details tab)
- Bug fixes

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- When inputting transaction, allow toggling between cost per share or total cost
- Add a setting to adjust whether cash is included in portfolio returns percentage calculations
- Simplify UI for adding a transaction
- Add confirmation dialog before deleting local data on server sync page
- Bug fixes

title: My Stocks Portfolio & Widget

container.value: 641 O Farrell Street, San Francisco, CA

creator: Peeksoft: Stock Market & Investing
descriptionHtml:
✓ Track stocks and equity, funds, ETFs, currencies in the stock market, and unlisted equity

✓ Manage your stock portfolios and view performance over time, with metrics such as realized gains, unrealized gains, daily and total changes, and annualized gains

✓ View allocation balance of each stock holding in your overall portfolio with pie charts

✓ Multiple stocks portfolios support - track multiple stock markets, stock portfolios, or watchlists

✓ Convert stock portfolios to one currency using real-time foreign exchange rates - mix stock quotes and holdings from different stock markets and display it using a currency of your choice

✓ Stock market news feed and news for each stock quote. Customize which international markets to retrieve news for.

✓ Real-time stock quotes for US exchanges and some international stock markets

✓ Foreign exchange rates and currency converter

✓ Track the Cryptocurrency market. Supports Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, and alt coins such as Ripple, Bitcoin Cash, Monero, and more.

✓ Extended hours support for pre-market and after-market hours

✓ Stocks widget that displays stock quotes and holdings

✓ Full screen charts. Line, Area, Candlestick, Logarithmic and more. Pinch-zoom, trackball, and panning support.

✓ Detailed info on each stock quote including daily/yearly price ranges, market cap, P/E, EPS, Volume, Average Volume, Beta, Dividend & Yield.

✓ Password lock support - prevent others from seeing your stock quotes even if your phone is unlocked

✓ Synchronize across multiple devices

✓ CSV import and export to Google Drive and Email

- Allow making unlisted quote into listed
- Fix chart with some LSE stocks
- Fix issue with pie chart category not displaying when none are set
- Fix issue with clicking on quote preview on add quote page not opening details page
- If your app is crashing on startup, please update the apps 'Android System WebView' and 'Chrome' (if installed) from the Google Play Store. This issue is affecting many apps.

title: My Stocks Portfolio & Widget

container.value: 641 O Farrell Street, San Francisco, CA

creator: Peeksoft: Stock Market & Investing
descriptionHtml:
✓ Track stocks and equity, funds, ETFs, currencies in the stock market, and unlisted equity

✓ Manage your stock portfolios and view performance over time, with metrics such as realized gains, unrealized gains, daily and total changes, and annualized gains

✓ View allocation balance of each stock holding in your overall portfolio with pie charts

✓ Multiple stocks portfolios support - track multiple stock markets, stock portfolios, or watchlists

✓ Convert stock portfolios to one currency using real-time foreign exchange rates - mix stock quotes and holdings from different stock markets and display it using a currency of your choice

✓ Stock market news feed and news for each stock quote. Customize which international markets to retrieve news for.

✓ Real-time stock quotes for US exchanges and some international stock markets

✓ Foreign exchange rates and currency converter

✓ Track the Cryptocurrency market. Supports Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, and alt coins such as Ripple, Bitcoin Cash, Monero, and more.

✓ Extended hours support for pre-market and after-market hours

✓ Stocks widget that displays stock quotes and holdings

✓ Full screen charts. Line, Area, Candlestick, Logarithmic and more. Pinch-zoom, trackball, and panning support.

✓ Detailed info on each stock quote including daily/yearly price ranges, market cap, P/E, EPS, Volume, Average Volume, Beta, Dividend & Yield.

✓ Password lock support - prevent others from seeing your stock quotes even if your phone is unlocked

✓ Synchronize across multiple devices

✓ CSV import and export to Google Drive and Email
descriptionShort: Track Stocks, your Stock Portfolios, and your Investment Performance

- Change crypto to display change in 24-hour intervals
- Allow making unlisted quote into listed

creator: Peeksoft: Stock Market & Investing
descriptionHtml:
✓ Track stocks and equity, funds, ETFs, currencies in the stock market, and unlisted equity

✓ Manage your stock portfolios and view performance over time, with metrics such as realized gains, unrealized gains, daily and total changes, and annualized gains

✓ View allocation balance of each stock holding in your overall portfolio with pie charts

✓ Multiple stocks portfolios support - track multiple stock markets, stock portfolios, or watchlists

✓ Convert stock portfolios to one currency using real-time foreign exchange rates - mix stock quotes and holdings from different stock markets and display it using a currency of your choice

✓ Stock market news feed and news for each stock quote. Customize which international markets to retrieve news for.

✓ Real-time stock quotes for US exchanges and some international stock markets

✓ Foreign exchange rates and currency converter

✓ Track the Cryptocurrency market. Supports Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, and alt coins such as Ripple, Bitcoin Cash, Monero, and more.

✓ Extended hours support for pre-market and after-market hours

✓ Stocks widget that displays stock quotes and holdings

✓ Full screen charts. Line, Area, Candlestick, Logarithmic and more. Pinch-zoom, trackball, and panning support.

✓ Detailed info on each stock quote including daily/yearly price ranges, market cap, P/E, EPS, Volume, Average Volume, Beta, Dividend & Yield.

✓ Password lock support - prevent others from seeing your stock quotes even if your phone is unlocked

✓ Synchronize across multiple devices

✓ CSV import and export to Google Drive and Email
descriptionShort: Track Stocks, your Stock Portfolios, and your Investment Performance

appDetails.developerAddress: 641 O Farrell Street, San Francisco, CA
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Fix color issue on widget overview when on light theme
- Fix mini mode issue on daily movers
- Enable sign-in screen on devices without google play services (except google sign-in)
- Use Google, Cloudflare, and network DNS to fix network connection issues on some devices with flakey/bad DNS servers, bad VPN servers, etc. which were causing slow connections. Alternatively you can override your DNS server from phone settings.
- Change crypto to display change in 24-hour intervals

✓ Full screen charts. Line, Area, Candlestick, Logarithmic and more. Pinch-zoom, trackball, and panning support.

✓ Detailed info on each stock quote including daily/yearly price ranges, market cap, P/E, EPS, Volume, Average Volume, Beta, Dividend & Yield.

✓ Password lock support - prevent others from seeing your stock quotes even if your phone is unlocked

✓ Synchronize across multiple devices

✓ CSV import and export to Google Drive and Email

title: My Stocks Portfolio & Widget

container.value: 30 N Gould St, Ste 21145, Sheridan, WY 82801

creator: Peeksoft: Stock Market & Investing
descriptionHtml:
✓ Track stocks and equity, funds, ETFs, currencies in the stock market, and unlisted equity

✓ Manage your stock portfolios and view performance over time, with metrics such as realized gains, unrealized gains, daily and total changes, and annualized gains

✓ View allocation balance of each stock holding in your overall portfolio with pie charts

✓ Multiple stocks portfolios support - track multiple stock markets, stock portfolios, or watchlists

✓ Convert stock portfolios to one currency using real-time foreign exchange rates - mix stock quotes and holdings from different stock markets and display it using a currency of your choice

✓ Stock market news feed and news for each stock quote. Customize which international markets to retrieve news for.

✓ Real-time stock quotes for US exchanges and some international stock markets

✓ Foreign exchange rates and currency converter

✓ Track the Cryptocurrency market. Supports Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, and alt coins such as Ripple, Bitcoin Cash, Monero, and more.

✓ Extended hours support for pre-market and after-market hours

✓ Stocks widget that displays stock quotes and holdings

✓ Full screen charts. Line, Area, Candlestick, Logarithmic and more. Pinch-zoom, trackball, and panning support.

✓ Detailed info on each stock quote including daily/yearly price ranges, market cap, P/E, EPS, Volume, Average Volume, Beta, Dividend & Yield.

✓ Password lock support - prevent others from seeing your stock quotes even if your phone is unlocked

✓ Synchronize across multiple devices

✓ CSV import and export to Google Drive and Email

creator: Peeksoft: Stock Market & Investing
descriptionHtml:
- Track stocks and equity, funds, ETFs, currencies in the stock market, crypto, and unlisted equity

- Real time price alerts to notify you of price changes in the stock market

- Manage your stock portfolios and view performance over time, with metrics such as realized gains, unrealized gains, daily and total changes, and annualized gains

- View allocation balance of each stock holding in your overall portfolio with pie charts

- Multiple stocks portfolios support - track multiple stock markets, stock portfolios, or watchlists

- Convert stock portfolios to one currency using real-time foreign exchange rates - mix stock quotes and holdings from different stock markets and display it using a currency of your choice

- Full screen charts. Line, Area, Candlestick, Logarithmic and more. Pinch-zoom, trackball, and panning support.

- Detailed info on each stock quote including daily/yearly price ranges, market cap, P/E, EPS, Volume, Average Volume, Beta, Dividend & Yield.

- Password lock support - prevent others from seeing your stock quotes even if your phone is unlocked

- Synchronize across multiple devices

- CSV import and export to Google Drive and Email

- Manage your stock portfolios and view performance over time, with metrics such as realized gains, unrealized gains, daily and total changes, and annualized gains

- View allocation balance of each stock holding in your overall portfolio with pie charts

- Multiple stocks portfolios support - track multiple stock markets, stock portfolios, or watchlists

- Convert stock portfolios to one currency using real-time foreign exchange rates - mix stock quotes and holdings from different stock markets and display it using a currency of your choice

- Stock market news feed and news for each stock quote. Customize which international markets to retrieve news for.

- Real-time stock quotes for US exchanges and some international stock markets

- Foreign exchange rates and currency converter

- Track the Cryptocurrency market. Supports Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, and alt coins such as Ripple, Bitcoin Cash, Monero, and more.

- Extended hours support for pre-market and after-market hours

- Stocks widget that displays stock quotes and holdings

- Full screen charts. Line, Area, Candlestick, Logarithmic and more. Pinch-zoom, trackball, and panning support.

- Detailed info on each stock quote including daily/yearly price ranges, market cap, P/E, EPS, Volume, Average Volume, Beta, Dividend & Yield.

- Password lock support - prevent others from seeing your stock quotes even if your phone is unlocked

- Synchronize across multiple devices

- CSV import and export to Google Drive and Email
